page.title: 05TRANSPORT AROUND MILVERTON
page.content:
FROM MILVERTON, EVERY DAY EIGHT BUSES GO TO WIVELISCOMBE, LANGLEY MARSH AND MAUNDOWN. EIGHT BUSES GO TO HILLCOMMON, TONE VALE HOSPITAL, NORTON FITZWARREN, BINDON ROAD AND TAUNTON. THE BUS NUMBER IS 205. NOT MANY PEOPLE USE THE BUS. ON MONDAY,JULY 8TH 1985, THREE PEOPLE GOT ON THE TAUNTON BUS AT 11.50, AND TWELVE PEOPLE WERE ALREADY ON IT. NOBODY GOT ON THE TAUNTON BUS AT 1.50, AND ONLY FIVE PEOPLE WERE SITTING ON IT. A PRIVATE COMPANY RUNS A SERVICE TO WIVELISCOMBE AND WELLINGTON SIX TIMES A DAY.
NO BUSES AT ALL RUN THROUGH OAKE VILLAGE. IN FACT, NO OTHER BUSES RUN ANYWHERE IN OUR DOMESDAY SQUARE. THE RAILWAY LINE HAS CLOSED DOWN. SO PEOPLE WHO WANT TO TRAVEL WHERE THE BUS DOES NOT RUN HAVE GOT TO TRAVEL BY CAR.
